trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for events associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.DataObject"></xref> class.
Cancels the associated command or operation.
This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.CommandCancelled%2A> property to `true`.
After an event has been canceled, it cannot be reactivated.
If this method is called on a drag-and-drop operation (as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.IsDragDrop%2A> property), the entire drag-and-drop operation is canceled.
Gets a value indicating whether the associated command or operation has been canceled.
Call the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.CancelCommand%2A> method to set this property to `true` and cancel the associated command or operation.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the command has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the associated event is part of a drag-and-drop operation.

If this property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Copying> event is raised when dragging is initiated and the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> event is raised when the selection is dropped.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated event is part of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
